problem_text: Find F B if S A and F B are altitudes and \triangle R S T \sim \triangle E F G.
compact_text: Find FB if SA and FB are altitudes and \triangle RST \sim \triangle EFG.
annotat_text: Find $F B$ if $\overline{S A}$ and $\overline{F B}$ are altitudes and $\triangle R S T \sim \triangle E F G$
